value:
$WmMPID_双界チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|RAWRR! I'm a scary monster!
If you don't give me treats, I'll
play a trick on you!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|Ah, what a fearsome creature.
I do hope this offering is enough
to satisfy you.$k$p$WmMPID_双界チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Yay, sweets! Hee hee, thank you!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|Heh... Now, I have heard...your family
is closely related to my dragon tribe...
Is it true?$k$p$WmMPID_ニニアン,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Y-yes.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|I see...$k$p$WmMPID_ニニアン,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Um... Is something wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|I apologize. I just was thinking about
my family—my children. When they
were young, a long time ago...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロイナ,ch09_21_Ina_F_Halloween20,Face|Your Majesty...$k$p$WmMPID_双界チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Where are they now, your children?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|My youngest is back home, in our
country, but my daughter and elder
son are in...another place.$k$pA place that cannot be easily visited.$k$p$WmMPID_双界チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Oh... That sounds sad. I know
about being sad...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|I am sorry. I had no intention of
making you sad. Please, go and
enjoy the festival.$k$p$WmMPID_ニニアン,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Yes, let's go, Tiki.$k$p$nMPID_双界チキ|All right...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_双界チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Ninian, do you think there's anything
we can do for that old man we just
met—to help him, I mean?$k$p$nMPID_ニニアン|I'm not sure... But we can work
together to think of something.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Halloween20,Face|What's with the serious face, Tiki?
I'm happy to help if I can... And that
lady over there can help too!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|...Did you just point at me?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ハロルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Halloween20,Face|Familial bonds... Hmph.$k$pWe should be above such paltry
mortal emotions.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Halloween20,Face|If I knew what his son and daughter
looked like, I could transform into
them and appear to him, but...$k$pI think that may not be the best idea.
...Sorry I can't be of more help.$k$p$WmMPID_双界チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Thank you for trying.
I will keep thinking!$k$p$Sbs150|
